StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCollegeView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode as Int, @FiscalYear as Int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT [CollegePro.leID] ,hs.[SCHOOL_CODE] AS SchoolCode ,hs.[RowGuid] as SchoolRowGuid ,hs.highschool_name AS CollegeName ,FiscalYear ,cp.PriorityCode AS Priority ,cp.BarronsIndex AS BarronIndex ,cp.NumMale ,cp.NumFemale ,cp.NumAfricanAmerican ,cp.NumHispanic ,cp.NumOther ,ISNULL(PercentQuali.ed,0) AS PercentQuali.ed ,ISNULL(NumQCPMale,0) AS NumQCPM ,ISNULL(NumQCPFemale,0) AS NumQCPF ,ISNULL(NumDQCPMale,0) AS NumDQCPM ,ISNULL(NumDQCPFemale,0) AS NumDQCPF ,0 AS NumPool ,0 AS NumAEV ,TimeToCollegeInMinutes ,DistanceToCollege FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].High_School hs LEFT OUTER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp on cp.school_code = hs.school_code and cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear WHERE hs.school_code = @SchoolCode AND hs.school_type <> 'HS' ORDER BY cp.[SCHOOL_CODE]
SET NOCOUNT OFF
